title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 332.2 - Responsibilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 332.2 - Responsibilities

State Regulations

Individual councils and, in the case of the State

University College of Environmental Science and Forestry, the board of
trustees, shall exercise such powers as are provided for in the Education Law, subject to the general management, supervision, control, and approval of and in
accordance with rules established by the State University trustees. Consistent
with the statutory responsibilities of such bodies, they shall develop and
foster strong relationships between their institutions and local communities
and promote campus and university interests. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
332.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
